thread.title: BRIEF-Gulfport Energy Says ‍Net Production For Q4 Of 2017 Averaged 1,263.3 MMcfe Per Day, A 5 Pct Increase Over Q3​

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Gulfport Energy Says ‍Net Production For Q4 Of 2017 Averaged 1,263.3 MMcfe Per Day, A 5 Pct Increase Over Q3​
text:
Jan 29 (Reuters) - Gulfport Energy Corp:
* GULFPORT ENERGY CORPORATION PROVIDES FOURTH QUARTER 2017 OPERATIONAL UPDATE
* GULFPORT ENERGY CORP - ‍NET PRODUCTION FOR Q4 OF 2017 AVERAGED 1,263.3 MMCFE PER DAY, A 5% INCREASE OVER Q3​
* GULFPORT ENERGY CORP - ‍FOR Q4, NET DAILY PRODUCTION MIX WAS COMPRISED OF ABOUT 89% NATURAL GAS, 7% NATURAL GAS LIQUIDS AND 4% OIL​ Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
